data.name: Shroomscape Zone Demo
data.detailed_description:
The game is planned to be not too easy, without cheap tricks like not allowing more than two enemies to engage at once or always missing their first shot. If you manage to wake up a hundred monsters, they all will be trying to kill you, no slacking!



I try to pay some good attention to details and I like those details to look nice. In video games a texture may pop out here and there and some polygons some times do not align. But not on my watch!

As for platforming, I hate when a game makes you jump on razor-thin edges and needle-wide platforms. Jumping around is fun. Jumping around cool and beautiful architecture is fun and joy. Jumping and failing just because you've pushed the jump button for a nanosecond too long or short is not fun. I want this game to be fun.
data.about_the_game:
The game is planned to be not too easy, without cheap tricks like not allowing more than two enemies to engage at once or always missing their first shot. If you manage to wake up a hundred monsters, they all will be trying to kill you, no slacking!



I try to pay some good attention to details and I like those details to look nice. In video games a texture may pop out here and there and some polygons some times do not align. But not on my watch!

As for platforming, I hate when a game makes you jump on razor-thin edges and needle-wide platforms. Jumping around is fun. Jumping around cool and beautiful architecture is fun and joy. Jumping and failing just because you've pushed the jump button for a nanosecond too long or short is not fun. I want this game to be fun.
data.short_description: Shroomscape Zone is a beautiful and also surreal action shooting game with light platforming and puzzle elements. It utilizes realistic ballistics with honest physics simulation, hit-scan is not allowed!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: SSE4.1 capable
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.2 capable
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: if you want to enjoy sounds
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Fast quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Kernel 3.0 or later
  • Processor: SSE4.1 capable
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.2 capable
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Kernel 5.11 or later
  • Processor: Fast quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060
